name: The Last Train Home - Game 5
description:
The Last Train Home

A post-apocalyptic survival game on a train. You play as James and Jennifer as you race to get to the east coast before the last ship  leaves.

How to Play

Do action/See info - Click/Touch

Camera - Drag Mouse/Touch

Mute Sound - M 

Project

This is game 5 of the "Make 10 games in 10 weeks" project by Paul from Paul Makes Games. Please leave me some feedback and check out my social media from the game description.

Follow the project

Twitter: https://twitter.com/PaulMakesGames
